label: 封戸
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: prebendal units or residence units (ko 戸), taxes of which were assigned to support high ranking officials, temples, and shrines under the ritsuryô system. However the system had mostly ceased functioning by mid-Heian times. [律令]
